summary: This bill, HR 5717, designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located at 514 Frelinghuysen Avenue in Newark, New Jersey, as the "Mildred Joyce Coleman Crump Post Office Building." The bill specifies that all legal and official references to the facility should now use the new name. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives by Mrs. McIver and co-sponsored by several other representatives.
